    Aggregates payment via integration to the major card schemes.

    Upperlink Paygate aggregates payment via integration to the major card schemes.

    It not only supports the use of Visa cards, Mastercard and Verve cards, but also supports a unique kind of account to account payment in which a pseudo-account number that carries the name of the payer is generated on the fly and the payer can validate the account number and transfer funds to it from any banking app with the merchant’s system updated in real-time immediately the transfer happens.

    Get started with PayGate

    Manage multiple bank account across different banks.

    The Bank Account Monitoring System BAMS is a solution developed to help Finance/Treasury Managers in their day to day management of multiple bank accounts across different banks. It also helps to improve efficiency in treasure management, tax remittance and prevents complications posed by contemporary finance management process.

    • Summarized Dashboard

    • Vendor/Bulk Payment

    • Single Account View

    • E-Tax Payment

    • Fund Sweeping

    • Comprehensive Rep

    Get started with BAMS

    Fees Collection and Utility Payment

    • Real time transaction monitoring

    • Ease of remittance

    • Efficient reconciliation

    Easy Integrations

    BAMS helps to combine multiple accounts across different banks into an integral whole thereby giving you access to selected and joint summary of accounts.
    Ease of integration and data extraction from legacy applications, Instant and real time crediting of beneficiaries, Calculate and remits WHT, VAT etc to statutory authorities It saves time, reduces risk and human errors.

    NIBSS Services

    Upperlink is a CBN licensed Payment Solution Service Provider (PSSP) and an aggregator to the Nigeria Inter-Bank Settlement System (NIBSS).

    Learn more

    PayChoice

    Make payment with out end to end seamless basis from anywhere with just a button click. Pay choice is a secure, automated and easy to use solution designed to initiate bulk payment and remittances.

    We are accredited registrar in Nigeria and the first ICANN-accredited registrar in Nigeria. Our cloud services includes domain registration, hosting and lot more.

    Other Services from Upperlink

    The Upperlink brand is our Masterbrand, evolving from the founding vision of the company, to stimulate appetite for interaction and connect the different key elements within the digital and financial ecosystems. We render a host of other services including domain reseller, site builder, google workspace, professional email, corporate email, SSL certificate, sitelock and lot more... Our mandate is to continue creating digital and financial Solutions that will be used by at least one person in every family of Five in Africa.
